Posts.Content: August2015 wrote: Hi everyone, I was diagnosed with DCIS and have strong family history so I am thinking BMX. I am trying for finalize my BS/PS team at this time. Has anyone been operated on by the following physicians and could tell me their experience and how they feel/look after the surgeries? Please share the details of your surgical journey/reconstruction as I am having tough time deciding who to go with. Dr. William Samson at St. Luke Roosevelt Dr. Freya Schnable and Dr. Nolan Karp at NYU Dr. Dr. Sheldon Feldman and Dr. Robert Grant at Columbia Thanks!! Log in to post a reply
